titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Lake rhymes : 18 songs / performed by Lee Murdock.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Lake rhymes : 18 songs / performed by Lee Murdock.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: The Erie Canal -- The Illinois and Michigan Canal -- Haul away Joe -- Rolling home -- The sailor's alphabet -- The lumberman's alphabet -- Deep blue horizon -- The Great Lakes song -- Follow the drinkin' gourd -- Shenandoah-Shenandore -- The Persia's crew -- Lost on the Lady Elgin -- Yankee Brown -- The housewife's lament -- The red iron ore -- The Christmas Ship -- The Bigler's crew -- The crack schooner Moonlight.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Accompanies: Murdock, Lee. Lake rhymes. Kaneville, IL : Depot Recordings Publications, 2004. 146 p. : ill., maps, music ; 28 cm.
